Title: Hum Dono
Writer: Vijay Anand, Nirmal Sircar (story), Montgomery Kee (war sequences)
Actors: Dev Anand, Nanda, Sadhana, Lalita Pawar
Plot: When an army officer is presumed dead in battle, his lookalike is tasked with breaking the news to his family. However, circumstances force him to impersonate the dead man.
